problem.markdown: Carbon dioxide at 3.5 bar pressure turns into ______ when cooled to about [mathjaxinline]–[/mathjaxinline] 196[mathjaxinline]^\circ[/mathjaxinline]C. ( ) Liquid (x) Solid ( ) Gas ( ) None of the above
problem.p: Carbon dioxide at 3.5 bar pressure turns into ______ when cooled to about [mathjaxinline]–[/mathjaxinline] 196[mathjaxinline]^\circ[/mathjaxinline]C.
